How It Works

Create Your Account

Register in seconds and receive 50 free credits to start your professional journey.

Choose Your Level

Explore 150 hand-crafted levels, from Beginner to Expert. Every victory increases your prestige.

Use Strategic Boosts

Stuck on a number? Use your credits to reveal difficult numbers or buy extra time.

Join the Elite 1% of Masters

With 150 handcrafted levels, only the most dedicated players reach the final stage. Are you ready to prove your intellectual dominance and climb the global leaderboard?

50k+Active Players
150Master Challenges
24/7Global Support

Common Questions

There are currently 150 handcrafted levels ranging from Easy to Expert. We update our puzzles regularly to keep the challenge fresh.

Credits can be used for strategic advantages like revealing a specific number (Hints) or purchasing extra time if the clock is running out on a difficult grid.

Yes! You can start playing immediately as a guest. All new accounts receive 50 free credits to get started on their journey.

If you create an account, your progress and credit balance are synced across all devices where you log in with your credentials.

Your score is determined by the difficulty of the level, the time remaining on the clock, and the number of mistakes made during the session.
